page.title: 15BIOGRAPHY
page.content: My aim in life is not to end up on the dole que but to have an active and meaningful life.I would like to go into scientific career and maybe some day reach the stage of being able to take part in space technology.If this career does not work out I would like to become a teacher in a middle school.My main subjects would be,again science and probably maths.Being a teacher in ten years time will probably be totally different to what teachers are like now.I think that I would be correct in saying that there will be more advanced equiptment used and maybe new subjects taught, therefore giving the children a better education than we are receiving now. Louise Senior Age 13 yrs
